title: At which state does ideal gas have the greatest T

content.description: An ideal gas in a closed container undergoes the cyclical process shown in the above graph of pressure <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mi>P</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> as a function of volume <math alttext="V" display="inline" overflow="scroll" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><mstyle><mrow><mi>V</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>.
content.question: In which state is the temperature of the gas the greatest?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
